mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mplan_artist (mp_artist, mp_content, mp_debut, mp_label, mp_useyn, mp_artistimg, mp_artistsize, mp_artistorg, mp_date) values (#{artist} , #{content}, #{debut}, #{label}, #{RadioGroup1}, #{fimgName}, #{imgsize}, #{uploadFimgName}, NOW()) ;

INSERT INTO mplan_album (mp_artist, mp_album, mp_content, mp_year, mp_corp, mp_albumimg, mp_albumsize, mp_albumimgorg, mp_useyn, mp_date ) values (#{artist} , #{album}, #{content}, #{year}, #{corp}, #{fimgName}, #{imgsize}, #{uploadFimgName}, #{RadioGroup1}, NOW()) ;

INSERT INTO mplan_music (mp_num, mp_artist, mp_title, mp_album, mp_lyric, mp_year, mp_corp, mp_label, mp_genre1, mp_genre2, mp_age, mp_open_date, mp_img, mp_imgsize, mp_imgo, mp_320k, mp_320size, mp_320ko, mp_192k, mp_192size, mp_192ko, mp_useyn, mp_insert_date) values (#{num}, #{artist}, #{title}, #{album}, #{lyric}, #{year}, #{corp}, #{label}, #{genre1}, #{genre2},#{age},#{copy}, #{fimgName}, #{imgsize}, #{uploadFimgName}, #{f320Name},#{m320size}, #{uploadF320Name}, #{f192Name}, #{m192size}, #{uploadF192Name}, #{RadioGroup1}, NOW()) ;
